    Packages & Promotions

    Health Check-up Packages

    Expire Date 31/12/2022
    4,200 - 27,500 Baht

    Full Health Check-up Packages 2022

    Female Health Check-up Packages

    • Vital Check-up Package – (Female age under 30)
    • Advanced Check-up Package – (Female age 30 – 40)
    • Executive Check-up Package – (Female age 40 – 50)
    • Executive Check-up  (Non EST) Package – (Female age 40 – 50)
    • Supreme Check-up Package – (Female age over 50)
    • Supreme Check-up (Non EST) Package – (Female age over 50)

    Male Health Check-up Packages

    • Vital Check-up Package – (Male age under 30)
    • Advanced Check-up Package – (Male age 30 – 40)
    • Executive Check-up Package – (Male age 40 – 50)
    • Executive Check-up  (Non EST) Package – (Male age 40 – 50)
    • Supreme Check-up Package – (Male age over 50)
    • Supreme Check-up (Non EST) Package – (Male age over 50)

    HEALTH DESIGN CENTER
    In order to prevent the transmission of COVID-19
    and maintain social distancing,
    please make an appointment at least 3 days in advance. 

    For COVID-19 prevention, unavailable tests are as follows: To prevent COVID-19 transmission, Lung Function Test is unavailable. The test must be postponed until it is further advised. 

    Recommendation :

    1. Please refrain from consuming except plain water for at least 8 hours prior to check-up.
    2. For convenience, please make an appointment at least seven days in advance and bring all daily medications to check-up center.
    3. The hospital serves the rights to amend prices, terms and conditions without prior notice.
    4. This package is valid from 1 January 2022 – 31 December 2022.

    Please contact us at Health Design Center, 5 th Floor, R Building

    For more information, please contact
    Health Design Center
    5 th Floor, R Building
    Daily 07.00 am. – 03.00 pm.
    (+66) 2755 1591
    (+66) 2310 3284
